texts.user_not_allowed:
Sorry but you are not allowed to use this bot.
Please contact the admin.
texts.restart_text: In order to restart the process type /start
texts.select_main_action: What do you want to do?
texts.start_new_expense: Which type of expense do you want to add
texts.select_expense_to_delete: Which expense do you want to delete? Write down the ID (multiple selection by separating the values with commas)
texts.deletion_result_OK: The following expenses were deleted successfully: {expenses}.
texts.deletion_result_KO: There were some errors trying to delte the following expenses: {expenses}
texts.confirm_expenses_to_delete: The following expenses are going to be deleted. Are you sure?
texts.receive_expense_type_message:
Expense Type: {expense_type}
Add a description (e.g.: store name)
texts.receive_expense_description_message:
Expense Description: {expense_description}.
Add the expense amount
texts.receive_finish_gathering_info_message: The following information has been inserted in the database
